profile.description: Tokyo Cement Company (Lanka) PLC manufactures and markets cement and ready mixed concrete in Sri Lanka. The company offers ordinary Portland cement under the Tokyo Super and Nippon brand names; blended hydraulic cement under the Tokyo Super brand; and tile adhesives under the Tokyo Superbond name. It also provides flooring compounds under the Tokyo Superflow name and waterproofing products under the Tokyo Superseal name; and internal and external wall plasters under the Tokyo Supercast name; pre-mix concrete under the Tokyo Supermix name; and Tokyo Superlight cellular lightweight concrete blocks. In addition, the company manufactures and sells sand and aggregates; and operates biomass power plants. Tokyo Cement Company (Lanka) PLC was founded in 1982 and is headquartered in Colombo, Sri Lanka.
